metadata.feature_description: Navigate through paginated list of users with configurable page sizes

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Users and observe the default pagination settings
steps.expected: Default page size should be 10 users per page
steps.actual: Pagination dropdown shows '10 users per page' and displays first 10 users (Showing 1-10 of 18 entries)

steps.expected: Should display total number of users in the format 'Showing X-Y of Z entries'
steps.actual: Pagination shows 'Showing 1-10 of 18 entries' correctly displaying the total count of 18 users

steps.action: Observe the page indicator in pagination controls
steps.expected: Current page number should be displayed and highlighted
steps.actual: Page indicator shows '1' on initial load, updates to '2' when navigating to next page

steps.action: Click the next page arrow in pagination controls
steps.expected: Should navigate to page 2 and show users 11-18
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2, showing 'Showing 11-18 of 18 entries' with page indicator showing '2'

steps.action: From page 2, click the previous page arrow
steps.expected: Should navigate back to page 1 and show users 1-10
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to page 1, showing 'Showing 1-10 of 18 entries' with page indicator showing '1'

steps.action: Click the last page navigation button (double arrow right)
steps.expected: Should navigate to the last page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2 (last page), showing 'Showing 11-18 of 18 entries'

steps.action: Click the first page navigation button (double arrow left)
steps.expected: Should navigate to the first page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 1, showing 'Showing 1-10 of 18 entries'

steps.action: Click on the page size dropdown and select 25 users per page
steps.expected: Page size should change to 25 and show more users per page
steps.actual: Page size dropdown opened and selected '25 users per page'. Display updated to show all 18 users on single page (Showing 1-18 of 18 entries)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify pagination resets on filter change

steps.action: Navigate to page 2 with filter set to 'Authorized'
steps.expected: Should be on page 2 showing users 11-18
steps.actual: Successfully on page 2 showing 'Showing 11-18 of 18 entries'

steps.expected: Pagination should reset to page 1 and show 'Showing 1-10 of X entries'
steps.actual: BUG: User list correctly shows page 1 users (Test NewUser, Regular TestUser, etc.) but pagination display still shows 'Showing 11-18 of 18 entries' and page indicator shows '2'. The data resets correctly but the pagination UI does not sync.

issues: Pagination display does not sync when filter changes - data shows page 1 users but pagination text still shows page 2 info

observations: Code in Body/index.jsx correctly sets searchParameters.pageIndex = 0 and searchParameters.resetIndex = true on filter change (line 62-63), but the Pager component's display state appears to not receive or process the reset signal properly
Page size options confirmed available: 10, 25, 50, 100 (verified from UI dropdown)
Test conducted with 18 users in the system using 'Authorized' filter
